name: Extracast
tagline: Extracast allows playback of virtually any video format from your Mac to your Chromecast.
body:
# Extracast

Extracast allows playback of virtually any video format from your Mac to your Chromecast.

# License

Extracast is licensed under the GNU Public License.


#Basic Usage
 1. Download the latest build.
 
 2. Fire up the server.
 
 3. Open the player client.
 
 4. Select one or more video files and add them to your playlist.
 
 5. Connect to your Chromecast, grab a bowl of popcorn and enjoy!
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
